short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A browser extension for bookmark management.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A sleek Chrome extension for displaying a tidy bookmarks tree as a popup. Featuring a polished appearance, it includes bookmark search functionality and retains the memory of previously opened folders and scroll positions. Moreover, it stands out as one of the most keyboard-friendly extensions, boasting solid WAI-ARIA support.
